group.text: Congratulations ! You have been designated to [b]manage the Swiss power supply[/b] and to ensure a sustainable and resilient energy sector for the next 30 years (10 turns).
You can decide what the future energy system will look like, but always keep in mind that you need to [b]cover the Energy demand[/b].
You need to [b]supply[/b] enough [b]energy[/b] for your population. They need to charge their phones and play their favourite video games.
